DataListSpec.Name: Child Quota Waiting Process Success Data List
DataListSpec.Description: List of kids that were registered for a particular instance of the business process
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CHIDLQUOTAWAITINGLISTPROCESS_STATUSREPORT_SUCCESS (@contextID uniqueidentifier) as begin if @contextID is null return 1
declare @tablePrefix nvarchar(255) = 'dbo.USR_CHILDQUOTA_WAITINGLISTPROCESS_' -- This is the name of part of the success table name created by the business process (without the guid) declare @tableGUIDString nvarchar(50) = replace (convert (nvarchar(50),@contextID), '-', '_') -- Convert the guid to have underscores instead of dashes
declare @selectSuccessSQL as nvarchar(max) set @selectSuccessSQL = 'select CHILDPROJECTID, COUNTRYID, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID ' + ' from ' + @tablePrefix + @tableGUIDString
create table #childQuotaProcessExceptions(childProjectID uniqueidentifier, countryID uniqueidentifier, childID uniqueidentifier) insert into #childQuotaProcessExceptions exec (@selectSuccessSQL)
select countryc.LOOKUPID as CountryID, countryc.NAME as CountryName, projectc.LOOKUPID as ProjectID, projectc.NAME as ProjectName, so.LOOKUPID as ChildID, so_child.NAME as ChildName
from #childQuotaProcessExceptions cq inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = cq.childID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = cq.childID left join dbo.CONSTITUENT projectc on cq.childProjectID = projectc.ID left join dbo.CONSTITUENT countryc on cq.countryID = countryc.ID
order by CountryID, ProjectID, ChildID
end
